entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
